Text: Conference Call on Friday March Cc Steffes would like for you to participate in a conference call on Friday March at am Central am Eastern time The purpose of the call is to discuss Enrons legislativeFERC strategy related to California civil litigation The call should last about minutes The number for the call will be Host Code Participant Code If you have any questions regarding this call please give me a call at Thanks Marcia

Risk Assessment WG Mtg Feb Cc Shedd will present Enrons political risk insurance process at the February meeting Afterwards we will have presentations from other members of the risk group The meeting may take an extra minutes REMINDER If you will be participating by video conference please have your local technician call Rodney Keys in Houston at as soon as possible to make sure everything is ready for the call on Feb If you have any questions please give me a call at
Memo on EGA Top Cc the attached memo from Jim Steffes

Risk Assessment Conference CallSteffes would like to set up a conference call sometime during the week of July The call will take approximately hours Items to be discussed on the call are Going over the Top List Developing Due Diligence for New Deals Please email me to let me know what day and time would be best for you If you have any questions please give Jim Steffes a call at Thanks Marcia

Regulatory Risk Conference Call Agendarefer to agenda below for todays conference call A spreadsheet has been attached detailing assets that are currently under review along with persons responsible for assisting in this review process The Regulatory Risk Assessment Working Group Agenda Brief recap of meetings held in Canada and England Review the trends discovered from the first phase of risk assessment primarily the lack of a standardized due diligence process for Enrons businesses Focus on development of formal due diligence procedures for various business segments ie Generation Distribution possibly transmission and retail Formation of teams to tackle each of the segments separately Wrap up the second phase of regulatory risk assessment Conference Room EB has been reserved for this call
Risk Assessment Meeting Notescontact Gia Maisashvili or John Neslage and let them know which working group you would like to participate in Thanks Marcia

Western Wholesale Activities Gas Power Cc conference call meeting has been set up to discuss issues related to wholesale activities gas power The call will take place every Friday beginning March Conference room EB has been reserved for the Houston participants Date Every Friday beginning March Time pm Pacific pm Central and pm Eastern time Number Host Code for Jim only Participant Code for everyone else There will not be a call on Friday April Good Friday and Friday November Thanksgiving holiday If you have any questions regarding this call please give me a call at Thanks Marcia

Conference Call re Commissioner Masseys QuestionsForwarded by Marcia A LintonNAEnron on PM Marcia A Linton PM To Steve CT Tom ES Tom ES Dan NRONDEVELOPMENT James D nron Tom NRON Joe NRON cc Jeff nron Subject Conference Call re Commissioner Masseys Questions A conference call has been set up for Wednesday October at am Central time to discuss a response to Commissioner Masseys questions at the Edison Electric Institute meeting The call in number is Host Code for Jeff only is Participant Code for everyone else is Conference room EBC has been reserved for this call If you have any questions regarding this call please give me a call at Ext Thanks Marcia

Regulatory Risk Analyticsobjective of Enron Government Affairs is to provide quality service to the business units it supports while controlling overall costs Regulatory Risk Analytics is available to provide information and assistance to Enron Government Affairs staff when managing regulatory riskopportunity and developing a framework for valuation of regulatory and political activities Regulatory Risk Analytics is charged with measuring how Public Affairs advocacy is advancing Enrons vision John Neslage should be contacted for these and other related matters at Jim Steffes
